title: Gold Border for being Plat V?

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Soooo, I've been up and down Platinum this season and I got my hands tied up in school toward the end of the season and ended up just sitting at Plat V for a bit because I was fed up with ranked. I got on today to see the new fancy border and I see that its new and fancy, but its gold...

Anyone else running into this bug? I'm sure there's some things that Riot needs to work through but I would be very sad if I don't get a Plat border for being Platinum basically all season and even finishing Plat V.

Here's a lolnexus screenshot from yesterday before the servers went down:
https://gyazo.com/e8b4e7ff542376a3eaed33c3f631bd4d

Any help would be appreciated :)

replies.body: at least you received a border....

Hey Edgy Bump,

End of season rewards just began to roll out today. They'll be making their way to everyone in waves and the distribution for them should be completed by end of day on November 18th. If you haven't received the proper rewards just yet - hang tight! - they'll be added to your account soon!
Rewards aren't sent out right away, it takes some time.
